settings.description_text: All our products offer 1-year license and support. We offer 20% discount for yearly renewal. So if your buyers renew their license in the second year, we will also pay out the commission to you.

365 days long tracking period. It means since a visitor clicked your referral link to our website, the tracking cookie will be always valid in 365 days, unless the visitor manually clears the browser cookie
